ygData.subject: Re: Medium Sized Cloth Armor in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: As you face the Freeport bank there is a shop to your right.  They have a beautiful collection of very fashionable clothes there that are designed to fit a
ygData.messageBody:
As you face the Freeport bank there is a shop to your right. They have a
beautiful collection of very fashionable clothes there that are designed to
fit a human-sized individual.
Ronyn, Initiate of the 11th Circle, Bristlebane

>As the title says, is there anywhere in FP to purchase medium sized cloth
>armor? You would think being a human town there is, but so far all I can
>find is 2 pieces for sale in North Ro.
